xwikidoc.name: CourseSheet
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
{{velocity}} ## You can modify this page to customize the presentation of your object. ## At first you should keep the default presentation and just save the document. #set ($discard = $xwiki.ssfx.use("js/xwiki/table/table.css")) ==$doc.display('CourseName')==
(% class="grid" %) |(% colspan="2" %)**1. Information about the Study Program** |**1.1** Higher Learning Institution|**$doc.display('higherLearningInstitution')** |**1.2 **Faculty|**$doc.display('faculty')** |**1.3 **Department|**$doc.display('department')** |**1.4 **Field of Study|**$doc.display('fieldOfStudy')** |**1.5** Type of Degree|**$doc.display('typeOfDegree')** |**1.6** Study Program / Qualification|**$doc.display('studyProgram')**
(% class="grid" %) |(% colspan="8" %)**2. Information about the Course** |(% colspan="3" %)**2.1** Title|(% colspan="5" %)**$doc.display('courseName')** |(% colspan="3" %)**2.2** Course Coordinator|(% colspan="5" %)**$doc.display('courseCoordinators')** |(% colspan="3" %)**2.3** Laboratory Coordinators|(% colspan="5" %)**$doc.display('laboratoryCoordinators')** |**2.4** Year of study|**$doc.display('yearOfStudy')**|**2.5** Semester|**$doc.display('semester')**|**2.6** Evaluation Type|**$doc.display('evaluationType')**|**2.7** Course Type|**$doc.display('courseType')**
~* //OB – Compulsory / OP – Optional//
(% class="grid" %) |(% colspan="6" %)**3. Total Estimated Time **(hours per semester and study activities) |**3.1** Number of hours per week|**$doc.display('hoursPerWeek')**|**3.2** Course hours|**$doc.display('courseHoursPerWeek')**|**3.3** Laboratory hours|**$doc.display('labHoursPerWeek')** |**3.4 **Total hours planned|#set ($totalTimePlanned = $numbertool.toNumber($doc.display('courseHoursTotal')) + $numbertool.toNumber($doc.display('labHoursTotal'))) **$totalTimePlanned**|**3.5** Course hours|**$doc.display('courseHoursTotal')**|**3.6** Laboratory hours|**$doc.display('labHoursTotal')** |(% colspan="5" %)Time distribution|hours |(% colspan="5" %)Individual study using manuals, course notes, etc.|**$doc.display('courseStudyHours')** |(% colspan="5" %)Individual study in the library, using specialized electronic tools, field work|**$doc.display('libraryStudyHours')** |(% colspan="5" %)Preparation of seminaries/laboratories, homework, papers, portfolios, essays|**$doc.display('homeworkHours')** |(% colspan="5" %)Tutorials |**$doc.display('tutorialsHours')** |(% colspan="5" %)Exams|**$doc.display('examinationHours')** |(% colspan="5" %)Other activities|**$doc.display('otherActivitiesHours')** |(% colspan="5" %)**3.7 **Total hours of individual study [ST + DS + PS]| #set ($indStudy = $numbertool.toNumber($doc.display('courseStudyHours')) + $numbertool.toNumber($doc.display('libraryStudyHours')) + $numbertool.toNumber($doc.display('homeworkHours')) + $numbertool.toNumber($doc.display('tutorialsHours'))) **$indStudy** |(% colspan="5" %)**3.8 **Total hour per semester [no. of credits x 30 = T + E + C +TI ]| #set ($totalTime = $totalTimePlanned + $numbertool.toNumber($doc.display('examinationHours')) + $indStudy) **$totalTime** |(% colspan="5" %)**3.9 **Number of credits|**$doc.display('credits')**
~* //Obs. T = C + S//
(% class="grid" %) |(% colspan="2" %)**4. Preconditions **(if applicable) |**4.1 **Curriculum preconditions|$doc.display('preconditionsCurriculum') |**4.2 **Competence preconditions|$doc.display('preconditionsCompetence')
(% class="grid" %) |(% colspan="2" %)**5. Conditions **(if applicable) |**5.1 **For courses|$doc.display('materielRequirementsCourse') |**5.2 **For laboratories|$doc.display('materielRequirementsLab')
(% class="grid" %) |(% colspan="2" %)**6. Specific competencies** |**Professional Competencies**|$doc.display('competenciesProfessional') |**Transversal competencies**|$doc.display('competenciesTransversal')
(% class="grid" %) |(% colspan="2" %)**7. Objectives** |**7.1 General Objective**|$doc.display('objectivesGeneral') |**7.2 Specific objectives**|$doc.display('objectivesSpecific')
(% class="grid" %) |(% colspan="6" %)**8. (% class="grid" %) |(% colspan="7" %)**10. Evaluation** |**Activity type**|(% colspan="2" %)**10.1 Evaluation criteria**|(% colspan="2" %)**10.2 Evaluation methods**|(% colspan="2" %)**10.3 Percentage in final grade~(%)** |**10.4** Course|(% colspan="2" %)$doc.display('courseEvaluationCriteria')|(% colspan="2" %)$doc.display('courseEvaluationMethods')|(% colspan="2" %)$doc.display('courseEvaluationPercentage') |**10.4** Laboratory/Seminar|(% colspan="2" %)$doc.display('labEvaluationCriteria')|(% colspan="2" %)$doc.display('labEvaluationMethods')|(% colspan="2" %)$doc.display('labEvaluationPercentage') |(% colspan="7" %)**10.6** Minimum performance standards |(% colspan="7" %)$doc.display('minimumPerformanceStandards') {{/velocity}}
